Installation

Adding the SnapQuestion widget to your website is simple. Just add this script tag before the closing </body> tag:

<script src="https://cdn.snapquestion.com/widget.js" data-tenant="your-tenant-id"></script>

Configuration Options

Customize the widget with these data attributes:

  • data-tenant - Your unique tenant ID (required)
  • data-position - Widget position: "bottom-right" or "bottom-left" (default: "bottom-right")
  • data-color - Primary color in hex format (default: "#3B82F6")
  • data-api-url - Custom API endpoint (for self-hosted deployments)

Advanced Usage

You can also control the widget programmatically:

// Toggle widget visibility window.SnapQuestionWidget.toggle(); // Access configuration console.log(window.SnapQuestionWidget.config); // Reinitialize with new settings window.SnapQuestionWidget.init();

Try It Out!

Click the chat bubble in the corner to test the widget. Ask questions like:

  • "How do I reset my password?"
  • "What are your business hours?"
  • "How do I track my order?"
  • "Can I get a refund?"
